events.message: Applicant submitted the initial loan application seeking funds for a wedding event scheduled later this year.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised as a personal loan based on the purpose stated in the application.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to the applicant to assist throughout the personal loan approval process.
The loan officer conducted an initial review of the application documents and background information submitted.
Additional documents, including proof of wedding booking and income verification, were requested from the applicant.
Applicant provided all requested documents in a timely manner, including income statements and event contracts.
Credit history and score for the applicant were successfully obtained and show a good standing with no recent defaults.
Risk assessment was completed based on credit profile and income stability. The overall risk is considered moderate.
A loan offer with terms and interest rates was presented to the applicant for review and acceptance.
The applicant expressed satisfaction with the loan terms and requested a small adjustment in repayment schedule.
The application was escalated to senior management to review the requested repayment schedule adjustment.
The loan application was officially approved with the revised repayment terms agreed upon with the applicant.
Funds for the personal loan were disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account to cover wedding expenses.
Follow-up contacted the applicant to ensure satisfaction with loan disbursement and answer any questions.
The loan application case was formally closed after confirming all processes have been completed satisfactorily.
